name: An Exam About The Exiles Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Miguel O'Hara is Spider-Man. In which issue of "Exiles" did he join the team?
questions.explanation:
Seventy-Six.

	Miguel O'Hara has sharp claws to aid him in wall-crawling and is a different version than the Miguel O'Hara introduced in "Spider-Man 2099".

questions.text: Magnus dies in the second issue of "Exiles". Who replaces him?
questions.explanation:
Sunfire.

	Magnus was the son of Magneto and Rogue from Earth-27, whereas most of the Marvel Comics events take place in Earth-616. He died containing a nuclear explosion.

questions.text: What character are the teams told to kill when liberating children from a Sentinel-patrolled prison?
questions.explanation:
David Richards.

	David Richards was the son of Franklin Richards, whose parents were Reed Richards and Susan Storm, and Rachel Summers, whose father was Scott Summers.

questions.text: When Blink is first sent home, who replaces her?
questions.explanation:
Magik.

	Magik is actually Illyana Rasputin, younger sister of Colossus. Mercurial and moody, she was killed by an insane Hyperion.

Sunfire.

	Sunfire was Mariko Yashida, whereas the moniker has traditionally belonged to Shiro Yashida. She was killed by Morph, who was under the control of the Brood at the time.

questions.text: The team is told to "leave your possessions and earn your wings." This quotation involves Nocturne and Beak
questions.explanation:
True.

	Nocturne is Talia Josephine Wagner, the daughter of Nightcrawler and the Scarlet Witch. She can take possession of people and has increased agility.

Morph.

	Morph is a mutant whose real name is Kevin Sydney and who has the power to shape shift. He is not to be confused with Mimic, who can copy up to five powers.

questions.text: Which hero was the first to join the team of their own free will?
questions.explanation:
Spider-Man 2099.

	Spider-Man joined the team after he was publicly unmasked by Proteus, a mutant serial killer who hops from body to body.

questions.text: Thunderbird is the father of Nocturne's child.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Thunderbird is John Proudstar, who was a founding member of the team. He was struck comatose in the tenth issue of the series and dreamt extensively during his coma.

questions.text: Which person acted as the team's mentor?
questions.explanation:
Timebroker.

	The Timebroker was originally thought to be a real person, but was actually a psychic construct made by the alien race known as the Timebreakers, whose accidental chronal damage the Exiles strive to rectify.
